title: Ian Blackford – 2022 Comments on the Resignation of Liz Truss
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ian Blackford, the SNP leader at Westminster, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content: It was inevitable Liz Truss would have to go after all the damage she’s inflicted – but merely swapping leaders of a broken and chaotic Tory government is not enough.
There must now be a general election. People will accept nothing less.
